definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable

pinyin: gong1 gong4 jiao1 huan4 dian4 hua4 wang3 lu4
gong1 gong4 zhi1 shi5 fen4 zi3

sentences.english: Bus routes and railways, both overground and underground, converged on the station.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車線路和地上地下路軌都在該站交匯。
這趟公共汽車中途不停。

sentences.english: The task of mending the public finances could be postponed until after the election.
sentences.chinese: 對公共財政的修護可能要延遲到大選之後了。

sentences.english: The government has also engaged Western experts in crisis management.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府還致力於提高政府公共危機管理水平。

sentences.english: A common vocabulary or common understanding can help all in communications.
sentences.chinese: 一套公共詞彙或共識可以全方位幫助溝通。

sentences.english: The bus and the van collided.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車與客貨車相撞。

sentences.english: Is the office near public transport, either the subway or a bus station?
sentences.chinese: 新辦公室離公共交通工具，地鐵或者公共汽車站近嗎？

sentences.english: Is the office near public transport, either the subway or a bus station?
sentences.chinese: 新辦公室離公共交通工具，地鐵或者公共汽車站近嗎？

sentences.english: In the same year, the territory's first public indoor garden show in the opening scissors Lane.
sentences.chinese: 同年，境內第一座公共室內戲園在剪子巷開業。

sentences.english: Most well-known public systems have a proven track record.
sentences.chinese: 多數知名的公共系統都有良好的記錄。

sentences.english: Close public restaurants, lounges and shops.
sentences.chinese: 關閉公共餐廳，酒廊和商店。

sentences.english: Public finance is the functioning mode of finance in the country of market-oriented economy.
sentences.chinese: 公共財政是市場經濟國家財政運行模式。

sentences.english: Whether it is public or private.
sentences.chinese: 它是公共的還是私有的。

sentences.english: The bus disgorged a crowd of noisy children.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車上湧下來一羣嘰嘰喳喳的孩子。

sentences.english: You can take the bus and get off at the second stop.
sentences.chinese: 你可以坐公共汽車第二站下。

definition: private/personal/interpersonal/sb with whom one has a close personal relationship/a member of one's clique
to leave sth unused/to lie idle
